title: Item Set
body: Riot there is no way to create item sets unless you go to the legacy client. Could you please add this feature back onto the new client.

replies.body:
Yes, I agree, the new "recommended" feature was pretty well... off topic. I don't see the Items I used to always go, instead some other stuff, so please bring it back!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
